name: Bill Chirico
tagline: Full-stack architect building scalable systems and mentoring the next generation.
bio: Founder and CEO of Volvox LLC. 15+ years building apps, websites, and the occasional mass of spaghetti code he's not proud of. Runs a dev mentorship community since 2018 because he remembers what it's like to be lost. Believes software should help people help each other.

projects.name: Volvox
projects.description: Software development company and learning community.

projects.name: Volvox Website
projects.description: Company website built with Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS v4.

projects.name: Sobers
projects.description: Sobriety companion app for people in recovery.

projects.name: Decision Jar
projects.description: Mobile app helping users make decisions through gamified jar-picking mechanics.

name: Eleftheria Batsou
tagline: A Developer Advocate who loves to code, teach and write.
bio: Eleftheria is a Developer Advocate at Volvox, a public speaker for tech conferences, and a meetup co-organizer. She has a passion for coding, teaching, and writing about technology. With over 5 years of experience in community building, she enjoys helping developers learn and grow in their careers.

name: Hossain Jahed
bio: I am a frontend developer excelling at modern web design and web motion. I am also a member of the Volvox community.
